title: Light Tea, Sweet Wine - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Charming Protagonist   Child Abuse   Doting Love Interests   Handsome Male Lead   Heartwarming   Kind Love Interests   Multiple POV   Omegaverse   Possessive Characters   Reversible Couple   Short Story   Toys   Unconditional Love   Younger Love Interests
author: 月半丁
description: After he was differentiated into an Omega, Chen Xun was like a scrap of dirty paper. He no longer owns anything, his love and self-respect were in tatters. But he came across Rong Chuyun. Rong Chuyun patched him up completely.>
